description: Return the data for a query with the Network Flow Monitor query interface. You specify the query that you want to return results for by providing a query ID and a monitor name. This query returns the top contributors for a specific monitor. Create a query ID for this call by calling the corresponding API call to start the query, StartQueryMonitorTopContributors. Use the scope ID that was returned for your account by CreateScope. Top contributors in Network Flow Monitor are network flows with the highest values for a specific metric type. Top contributors can be across all workload insights, for a given scope, or for a specific monitor. Use the applicable call for the top contributors that you want to be returned.

parameters.name: queryId
parameters.description: The identifier for the query. A query ID is an internally-generated identifier for a specific query returned from an API call to create a query.

nested_items.name: unit
nested_items.description: The units for a metric returned by the query.

nested_items.name: topContributors
nested_items.description: The top contributor network flows overall for a specific metric type, for example, the number of retransmissions.

nested_items.name: localIp
nested_items.description: The IP address of the local resource for a top contributor network flow.

nested_items.name: snatIp
nested_items.description: The secure network address translation (SNAT) IP address for a top contributor network flow.

nested_items.name: localInstanceId
nested_items.description: The instance identifier for the local resource for a top contributor network flow.

nested_items.name: localVpcId
nested_items.description: The VPC ID for a top contributor network flow for the local resource.

nested_items.name: localRegion
nested_items.description: The Amazon Web Services Region for the local resource for a top contributor network flow.

nested_items.name: localAz
nested_items.description: The Availability Zone for the local resource for a top contributor network flow.

nested_items.name: localSubnetId
nested_items.description: The subnet ID for the local resource for a top contributor network flow.

nested_items.name: targetPort
nested_items.description: The target port.

nested_items.name: destinationCategory
nested_items.description: The destination category for a top contributors row. Destination categories can be one of the following:
INTRA_AZ: Top contributor network flows within a single Availability Zone.
INTER_AZ: Top contributor network flows between Availability Zones.
INTER_VPC: Top contributor network flows between VPCs.
AWS_SERVICES: Top contributor network flows to or from Amazon Web Services services.
UNCLASSIFIED: Top contributor network flows that do not have a bucket classification.

nested_items.name: remoteVpcId
nested_items.description: The VPC ID for a top contributor network flow for the remote resource.

nested_items.name: remoteRegion
nested_items.description: The Amazon Web Services Region for the remote resource for a top contributor network flow.

nested_items.name: remoteAz
nested_items.description: The Availability Zone for the remote resource for a top contributor network flow.

nested_items.name: remoteSubnetId
nested_items.description: The subnet ID for the remote resource for a top contributor network flow.

nested_items.name: remoteInstanceId
nested_items.description: The instance identifier for the remote resource for a top contributor network flow.

nested_items.name: remoteIp
nested_items.description: The IP address of the remote resource for a top contributor network flow.

nested_items.name: dnatIp
nested_items.description: The destination network address translation (DNAT) IP address for a top contributor network flow.

nested_items.name: value
nested_items.description: The value of the metric for a top contributor network flow.

nested_items.name: traversedConstructs
nested_items.description: The constructs traversed by a network flow.

nested_items.name: componentId
nested_items.description: The identifier for the traversed component.

nested_items.name: componentType
nested_items.description: The type of component that was traversed.

nested_items.name: componentArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of a tranversed component.

nested_items.name: serviceName
nested_items.description: The service name for the traversed component.

nested_items.name: kubernetesMetadata
nested_items.description: Meta data about Kubernetes resources.

nested_items.name: localServiceName
nested_items.description: The service name for a local resource.

nested_items.name: localPodName
nested_items.description: The name of the pod for a local resource.

nested_items.name: localPodNamespace
nested_items.description: The namespace of the pod for a local resource.

nested_items.name: remoteServiceName
nested_items.description: The service name for a remote resource.

nested_items.name: remotePodName
nested_items.description: The name of the pod for a remote resource.

nested_items.name: remotePodNamespace
nested_items.description: The namespace of the pod for a remote resource.

nested_items.name: localInstanceArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of a local resource.

nested_items.name: localSubnetArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of a local subnet.

nested_items.name: localVpcArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of a local VPC.

nested_items.name: remoteInstanceArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of a remote resource.

nested_items.name: remoteSubnetArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of a remote subnet.

nested_items.name: remoteVpcArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of a remote VPC.

nested_items.name: nextToken
nested_items.description: The token for the next set of results. You receive this token from a previous call.
